metadata.title: CVE-2021-42040 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in MediaWiki through 1.36.2. A parser functionrelated to loop control allowed for an infinite loop (and php-fpm hang)within the Loops extension because egLoopsCountLimit is mishandled. Thiscould lead to memory exhaustion.

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
